Class HSSFDateUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.DateUtil

  • Deprecated. 
    Use DateUtil instead

    @Deprecated
public final class HSSFDateUtil
extends DateUtil
    Contains methods for dealing with Excel dates.
